title: email blasts
extract: Definition of: e-blast. e-blast. (E-mail-BLAST) An email message that is sent out to many recipients. If the volume is huge, and the recipients are random rather than targeted, an e-blast is no different than spam.
extract_html: Definition of: e-blast. e-blast. (E-mail-BLAST) An email message that is sent out to many recipients. If the volume is huge, and the recipients are random rather than targeted, an e-blast is no different than spam.
